search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for ChartMogul (chartmogul.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for ChartMogul's pricing page is [https://chartmogul.com/pricing/](https://chartmogul.com/pricing/).

Compare your performance with the most current SaaS performance benchmarks available on the market.                Team dashboards 
Customize dashboards for each team displaying their real-time performance and progress to goal.    5   10   15      SaaS metric reports 
A comprehensive set of core reports, right out of the box, including ARR, LTV, retention and churn.                MRR reports 
Track individual MRR movements, see the impact of forex fluctuations on MRR, and scheduled expansion, contraction and churn events.                Cohort analysis 
Better understand retention and churn based on when customers subscribed.                Maps 
Visualize key subscription metrics geographically using heat maps.                Segmentation 
Segment any of your metrics by plan, location, customer type and other dimensions.                Custom charts 
Build and share custom reports.                Custom attributes 
Add more data points to customers and contacts like lead source, industry, and role.               iOS and Android apps               Email summary reports 
Opt-in for daily, weekly or monthly summaries of your SaaS performance.              
Data management     Subscription billing integrations 
Automatically import subscription data into ChartMogul where it will be converted into SaaS metrics. Note: you can add as many third-party integrations as needed.    1   3   15      Lead, trial and enrichment integrations 
Import leads and trials, or extend segmentation by enriching customer records from HubSpot, intercom, Segment, Zapier, and more.                Standard destinations 
Push updates and data to Slack, Intercom, or use our webhooks.    2   4   8      Advanced destinations 
Schedule exports of both normalized data and computed metrics to your data warehouse, cloud storage service or via email.       1   5      API 
Add, update and retrieve various object types, metrics and reports, and use our bulk endpoint for more efficient upload of large datasets.                CSV import and export 
Upload your customers and billing data, and export a range of metrics and detailed reports such as MRR per customer per month.                Scheduled exports 
Export and email MRR movements, customers, custom attributes, and tag data as CSV on a scheduled basis.                Audit and edit data 
Messy billing data shouldn’t mean inaccurate reporting. With ChartMogul you can quickly identify and remedy data issues directly in your account.                Data settings 
Control when to recognize churn, how refunds should be handled, what to do with delinquent subscribers, and much more.                Automations 
Create automated workflows by defining triggers, conditions, and actions.

To make great decisions, you need to know exactly how your business is performing. ChartMogul provides this insight and lets us run deeper analysis into our revenue and customer base.  Mariam Hakobyan, Co-founder and CEO    Learn how Founders and CEOs use ChartMogul   
   
 
ChartMogul keeps our leadership team up to date and aligned, while freeing us from manual reporting.  Eoin Lyons, VP Sales    Learn how Sales and Success use ChartMogul   
   
 
ChartMogul is infinitely configurable. Having flexibility means that we can build sophisticated integrations tailored perfectly to our needs.  Robin Birney, VP RevOps    Learn how RevOps and Developers use ChartMogul   
   
 
ChartMogul has revolutionized how we analyze our data, making it easy to uncover insights that drive our business forward. It's an indispensable tool for our team.  Jonathan Garcia, Sr Manager of Business Intelligence    Learn how BI professionals use ChartMogul      
Frequently Asked Questions   
Does ChartMogul have a free trial?  
 
 
Yes! Start a free trial to give Subscription Analytics a spin. Once you’ve connected a data source, ChartMogul will begin transforming your data and provide a set of reports for you to begin exploring. Before your 14-day free trial is up, you’ll need to switch to one of our plans to continue using ChartMogul. Please note, we do not offer a free trial of our CRM. Sign up for the Free plan to try out CRM.      
Is ChartMogul free to use?  
 
 
ChartMogul has plans for teams of all sizes, including a free plan for early stage companies. Any SaaS business with less than USD $10,000 MRR qualifies for our Free Subscription Analytics plan, and any SaaS business is able to use our Free CRM plan with 1 free seat.      
Do you have a startup program?  
 
 
Yes! We offer a $50 monthly discount for eligible startups for the first year of their ChartMogul Subscription Analytics subscription. To get more information and apply, see our startup program.      
Do you offer discounts?  
 
 
Our Pro plan comes with a 17% discount if you subscribe annually. We also offer multi-year discounts for the Enterprise plan. Contact us to discuss.      
What other platforms can ChartMogul connect with?  
 
 
ChartMogul has a robust ecosystem of integrations you can use to import, enrich and export data into the rest of your stack. One-click integrations are available for Stripe, Hubspot, Chargebee, Big Query, Snowflake, Segment and many more systems. See the full list of integrations here. In addition, see our developer documentation to understand how to use ChartMogul’s API to create custom integrations.      
Does ChartMogul have an API?  
 
 
Yes! To learn more, see our developer documentation.      
Are data migration and integration services available?  
 
 
Absolutely. Our customer success team is ready to help you. For more complex implementations we can refer you to a preferred solutions partner. Please send a short summary of your requirements and current setup to support@chartmogul.com.      
What's the difference between ChartMogul Subscription Analytics and CRM?  
 
 
Both products help you grow your SaaS business in different ways. 
ChartMogul Subscription Analytics is a powerful tool for executives, data analysts and finance teams to understand SaaS company performance. It transforms billing data into accurate and meaningful company metrics ready for segmentation, enrichment and analysis. Discover new ICPs, spot monetization opportunities and compare your growth to industry benchmarks. Create beautiful dashboards and charts ready to share with your team or board. 
ChartMogul CRM is designed for salespeople, account managers and sales leaders to acquire new customers and strengthen existing relationships. It enables you to contact leads, set follow-up tasks, create opportunities and track sales targets. Import new leads from HubSpot, Segment, Intercom or your database, ready for your team to work on.      
Can I speak to someone to answer a few more questions?  
 
 
Yes, our team is ready to help! Get in touch with our sales team or send us an email at support@chartmogul.com. You can also browse our Help Center at any time.        
Get started with ChartMogul   Start a free trial Book a demo

ChartMogul has plans for every subscription business, whether a fast-growing startup or large-scale enterprise. All graphs, charts and metrics are included as standard.
